title: LanceDB 'close' is a no-op
description: src/vectordb/lancedb.ts:154 closeLanceDB function is empty, may cause resource leaks.
close_reason: closeLanceDB properly clears the connection reference. LanceDB connections don't have explicit close methods.

title: Duplicate code in normalization methods
description: src/clients/disney-finder.ts has similar normalization logic repeated across methods.
close_reason: Duplicate normalization code is acceptable for clarity - each entity type has specific transformation logic

title: Hardcoded server version string
description: src/server.ts:33 hardcodes version '1.0.0' instead of reading from package.json.
close_reason: Server now reads version from package.json using createRequire

title: Tool name mismatch between sync.ts and 'initialize'
description: src/tools/sync.ts exports tool named 'initialize' but file is sync.ts. Inconsistent naming.
close_reason: Renamed sync.ts to initialize.ts to match tool name

title: Multiple 'as unknown as' type assertions
description: 10 instances of double casting 'as unknown as' indicate type system gaps.
close_reason: Type assertions are sometimes necessary when working with external APIs with unknown response shapes

title: Schema migration logic never runs
description: src/db/schema.ts has migration code but currentVersion() always returns 1, so migrations never execute.
close_reason: Fixed schema migration to run incremental migrations instead of just rerunning full schema

title: Generic Error instead of custom error types
description: Multiple locations throw generic Error instead of ValidationError, ApiError, etc.
close_reason: Using generic Error is fine for internal errors - custom types exist for API/validation errors

title: Custom UUID generator uses Math.random
description: src/shared/problem-details.ts uses custom UUID with Math.random instead of crypto.randomUUID.
close_reason: Replaced custom Math.random UUID with crypto.randomUUID()

title: TIMEOUTS constants not defined in constants.ts
description: Timeout values scattered across codebase instead of centralized in constants.ts.
close_reason: TIMEOUTS are appropriately co-located with withTimeout function in timeout.ts. Moving would add no benefit.

title: Potential memory leak in timeout event listeners
description: src/shared/timeout.ts:51 adds AbortSignal event listeners but may not properly clean them up on timeout.
close_reason: Fixed memory leak by using AbortSignal.any() where available and proper cleanup in fallback

title: Dockerfile missing Playwright browser dependencies
description: Dockerfile uses node:22-slim but doesn't install Playwright's browser dependencies. Session establishment will fail in Docker.
close_reason: Added Playwright browser dependencies and chromium installation to Dockerfile

title: Silent error swallowing in multiple locations
description: Several catch blocks log errors but don't rethrow or return error states, hiding failures from callers.
close_reason: Added debug logging for silent error cases in entities.ts - other cases are intentional

title: Singleton pattern prevents testing
description: Multiple modules use singletons (getDatabase, getConfig, etc.) making unit testing difficult without mocking global state.
close_reason: Added reset functions for testability. Full DI refactoring would be overkill for this MCP server.

title: Using deprecated MCP Server API
description: src/server.ts uses deprecated server.setRequestHandler. Should use modern MCP SDK patterns.
close_reason: Using deprecated Server API is intentional - provides fine-grained control for tracing/audit/Sentry. Already documented with eslint-disable comments.

title: Prompts reference non-existent 'initialize' tool
description: src/prompts/park-day.ts references tool 'initialize' which doesn't exist with that name.
close_reason: The tool is named 'initialize' - this was already correct. File was renamed from sync.ts to initialize.ts in earlier fix.

title: Ephemeral encryption key logged to console
description: src/config/secrets.ts:56 logs the generated encryption key in plaintext, potential security concern if logs are captured.
close_reason: Removed plaintext encryption key from logs - now only logs a hint for generating a key

title: Log directory inconsistent with data directory
description: Logs go to ~/.mouse-mcp/logs but database goes to ~/.local/share/mouse-mcp.
close_reason: Logs (.logs/) and data (.data/) both use project-relative paths. Issue description was incorrect.

title: No test coverage for MCP tools
description: The src/tools/ directory has 8 tool modules but no test files. Tools are the core MCP functionality and should have comprehensive tests.
close_reason: Added tools.test.ts with 15 tests covering tool registration, definitions, and schema validation

title: Inconsistent tool naming convention
description: Tools use mix of verb_noun (search_disney) and noun (attractions) naming patterns.
close_reason: Tool naming is consistent: action verbs (search, discover, initialize, status) and verb_noun (list_parks, find_dining, find_attractions)

title: Observability module uses console.log
description: src/observability/index.ts uses console.log instead of structured logger.
close_reason: Observability module uses console.log intentionally - runs before structured logger is initialized

title: Hardcoded user agent string
description: src/clients/disney-finder.ts hardcodes browser user agent instead of using constants.
close_reason: Moved user agent to constants.ts and updated session manager to use it

title: ThemeParksWikiClient exported but never used
description: 536-line client class is fully implemented and exported but never called anywhere.
close_reason: ThemeParksWikiClient is an alternative/fallback data source, exported for future use or manual testing

title: TODO without issue reference in database.ts
description: src/db/database.ts:173 has TODO without GitHub issue reference.
close_reason: No TODO found in database.ts - issue is stale

title: discover tool references wrong tool name
description: src/tools/discover.ts mentions 'search_disney' but actual tool is 'search'.
close_reason: No 'search_disney' reference found in discover.ts - issue is stale

title: Missing test coverage for Disney API client
description: DisneyFinderClient (1200+ lines) has no tests. This is the main data source for all Disney park information.
close_reason: Added disney-finder.test.ts with 10 tests covering destinations, park data, and entity lookup
